data.actual_result: the buttons below pushed down in landscape mode and cant be used.
data.expected_result: the buttons below should be accessible no matter what in orientation you are using.
data.short_description: you cannot access the delete or cancel button when deleting a server with 100 chars in total. possible in small screen and in landscape orientation.
data.steps_to_repro: - name the server with 100 chars in total. emojis does not count cuz it is unsupported behavior.  - flip in landscape. go to server settings>delete the server. observe
